content:
Dear All,

The University of Plymouth, UK, is inviting applications for a PhD studentship in Artificial Intelligence Methods for Cryptography in Critical National Infrastructure. More details are at the link:

https://www.jobs.ac.uk/job/CEU059/mphil-phd-studentship-artificial-intelligence-methods-for-cryptography-in-critical-national-infrastructure

The deadline for applications is 19th April.

MPhil/PhD Studentship: Artificial Intelligence Methods for Cryptography in Critical National Infrastructure at University of Plymouth
DoS Dr Matthew Craven (matthew.craven@plymouth.ac.uk, tel.: 01752 586329)
